title: Freedom Fighters and Freedom Haters with Brian Kilmeade and Madeline Lowe
itunes:title: Freedom Fighters and Freedom Haters with Brian Kilmeade and Madeline Lowe
description:
From the French Reign of Terror to the Bolsheviks to today, chaotic violence has always been a key tool of the left. Charlie interviews a freshman at UC-Davis and TPUSA chapter member, Madeline Lowe, who was maced three times by violent campus Maoists for trying to attend a TPUSA event. Plus, Brian Kilmeade joins Charlie to talk about his latest book, which explores the pro-Constitution, pro-freedom message of Frederick Douglas.

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
